   sphinx-quickstart on Wed Nov 30 12:02:14 2016.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to BiCro Commons docs!
=========================================

**BiCro Commons** is a *Python-based web server* which hosts basic **services** for the Bienko-Crosetto laboratories. It also hosts data-visualization sections for the lab's pipelines. Select a **section**/**service** below to read a detailed description, or go to the code section to navigate the packages code structure.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Webserver
   :name: webserver

   _static/webserver

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Sections
   :name: sections

   _static/gpseq_img
   _static/gpseq_seq

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Services
   :name: services

   _static/pool_designer
   _static/probe_designer

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Others
   :name: others

   _static/changelog
   _static/todo
